Lyrics: [Verse 1]
She's got legs, she knows how to use them
She never begs, she knows how to choose them
She's holdin' legs, you wonder how to feel them
Would you get behind them if you could only find them?
[Chorus 1]
She's my baby, she's my baby, yeah, it's alright
[Verse 2]
She's got hair down to her fanny
She's got a [thread?] skirt right up to her panties
Every time she's dancin', she knows what to do
Everybody wants to see, see if she can use it
[Chorus 2]
She's so fine, she's all mine, ooh girl, you got it right
[Verse 3]
She's got legs, she knows how to use them
She never begs, she knows how to choose them
She's got a dime all of the time
Stays out at night movin' through time
[Chorus 3]
Ooh, I want her, yeah, I got to have her
Ooh, the girl is alright, the girl is alright
Yeah, she's alright
Title: Nickelback – Legs Lyrics | Genius Lyrics
